title: European Countries Debate How to Cut Purchases of Russian Oil
sub_head: Disagreements among European governments make an early decision unlikely, and any exit from Russian oil is expected to be gradual
body:
European governments, having decided last week to phase out purchases of coal from Russia, are set to begin a debate this week about a more ambitious target: weaning themselves off Russian oil.
European Union officials in Brussels are seeking to make oil the focus of the blocâ€™s next set of economic measures against Russia over its invasion of Ukraine.
